page.title: 09HILLTOP FARM RAVENSDALE PARK
page.content: 144 acres. Rented from Richardson of Quarndon by Mr & Mrs Hall. Rateable value Â£136. Agricultural rateage 1.80p. Brick built. Rent paid half yearly. Mains water supply,spring water & electricity. Husband & wife work farm with occasional help. Have car, landrover tractors & other imp- lements. Dairy farm -42 Friesian milking cows,12 young stock & heifers 40 sheep. Free range poultry. Cows milked in 42standing cubicle shed Milk collected by tanker & goes to Milk Marketing Board, Alfreton Cream- ery. Grass cut for silage & stored in big bags. Bags are made of black poly -thene & cost approx Â£1 each. No bull is kept. Use Artificial Insemination. 2 children - boy 8 yrs, girl 10 yrs taken by car to school at Mugginton.
